history.proof: intros r r1 r2. split. - intros H. rewrite H. reflexivity. - hfcrush use: Ropp_minus_distr', Rplus_minus, Ropp_minus_distr.

exceptions.exn: In environment r, r1, r2 : R H : r - r1 = r - r2 Unable to unify "- (?M2290 - ?M2291) = ?M2291 - ?M2290" with "r1 = r2".
The LHS of Ropp_plus_distr (- (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of H (r - r1) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment r, r1, r2 : R H : r - r1 = r - r2 Unable to unify "r2" with "r1".

original: intros r r1 r2. split. - intros H. rewrite H. reflexivity. - intros H. apply Ropp_minus_distr. rewrite Ropp_plus_distr. rewrite H. reflexivity.
